question: A alone can complete a work in 12 days. A and B together can complete it in 8 days. How long will B alone take to complete the work?
explanation:
A\'s one day\'s work $latex = \\frac{1}{12}&s=1$
(A + B)\'s one day\'s work $latex = \\frac{1}{8}&s=1$
∴ B\'s one day\'s work = 
$latex = \\frac{1}{8} - \\frac{1}{12} = \\frac{3-2}{24} = \\frac{1}{24}&s=1$
∴ B alone can do the work in 24 days. 
Hence option [B] is the right answer
